text: Maria de Lourdes Alcívar Crespo (born 15 November 1963) is an Ecuadorian socialite. She was the First Lady of Ecuador from 24 May 2021 to 23 November 2023. She is the wife of President Guillermo Lasso. She also had an important role in her husband's political party Creating Opportunities party. ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:First Ladies of Ecuador Category:People from Guayaquil
title: María de Lourdes Alcívar
